item.description:
Rally to support bill HB 6519 to label Genetically Engineered foods!

Please join me in Hartford to help demand our right to know what's in our food.

With only 5 weeks left of the legislative session, we are in the home stretch.

Join us at the Capitol:

210 Capitol Ave , Hartford, CT

Tuesday, May 21st, from 11am-1pm

Please meet on the north side of the Capitol building (the side facing Bushnell Park) at 11:00am. We will join together to send a strong message to our legislators that we want the right to know what is in our food now.

After the rally, we will be joined by legislators for a GMO-free food tasting. There will be delicious food thanks to our generous CT farms, chefs and businesses (we will publish the list once it is complete). This is also a perfect opportunity to meet legislators face to face and ask them to support HB 6519 and HB 6527. Handouts on the bills will be provided by GMO Free CT.
item.how_to_find_us: North side of the Capital building. You'll see us all carrying signs. Come over and say hello iof you see me if I don't see you first.
item.name: Rally and GMO-Free Food Tasting
